name: Pingler
author: Pingler

sections.description:
Everytime you Publish a new post, this plugin will automatically
send the update information to Pingler.com so the whole world can
be notified that you keep your content fresh.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload pingler.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Update your settings in the Pingler Options Page under the settings menu
    a. Get your API key from your PIngler account and insert it here.
    b. All additional options will appear once you have entered your API key.
  4. There is no 4, like we was going to make it that difficult
sections.changelog:
V1.5.0 //CHANGES
* Upgraded to use our new API Key system, to offer more functionality.
* Added Pingler announcements to appear only on our plugin page.
* Plugin now requires API key to work.

V1.1.0 //CHANGES
* Added in the ability to Ping all posts from the Pingler Options Page.
* Added in the ability to Ping selected posts from the Pingler Options Page.

V1.0.0 This is version one, everything is new ðŸ˜‰

short_description: This Plugin is used to automatically Ping new posts to a variety of online blogs. For use with Pingler.com
